title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Fokker DR1 Triplane
description:
In this addon spotlight we will have a look at the Fokker DR1 Triplane which is an aircraft which has been recently released for MSFS 2020. The aircraft was originally used in WW I and you might have heard about the Red Baron. Which was actually referring to one of the famous pilots of this aircraft Baron Manfred Albrecht Freiherr von Richthofen.

If you want to also add this aircraft to your MSFS 2020 installation than download it via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/19612/fokker-dr1-triplane
